page.title: 17Childrens games.
page.content: Scarecrow Tigs. Scarecrow tigs is a game for six or more people .The object of the game is to run away from the person who is "on".If you are tigged you stand like a scarecrow.If another player goes under your arms and legs then you are free.When the person who is"on"has got everybody standing like a scarcrow the game has finished.The first person who was caught is now "on". Bulldog. Bulldog: a game for any number of people.The person"on"stands in a line along one side.The person "on" says somebody's name.They have to run past the person who is "on".If the player gets past the person "on" all the other people have to try to get past. This goes on until only one player is left. by Nicola Thorpe & Sam Hodgson.
